p: This work was supported by an Agence Nationale de la Recherche (ANR) grant MOBIGEN (ANR-09-PEXT-003) to A.H. and C.B., a Muséum National d'Histoire Naturelle `Action Transversale Muséum' ATM grant from the program `Biodiversité actuelle et fossile' to A.H. and a Marie Curie Reintegration grant (FP7-PEOPLE-IRG-2008 #239257) to C.B. This research was further funded by the ERA-Net BiodivERsA, with the national funders ANR, Deutsche Forschungsgemeinschaft, Belgian Science Policy and Fundação para a Ciência e a Tecnologia, as part of the 2013 BiodivERsA call for research proposals.
